meanings.sent1: Last night, I dreamed about flying in the sky.
meanings.sent2: She dreamed of becoming a famous singer one day.
meanings.sent3: The cat must have dreamed of catching a giant mouse.
meanings.sent4: His dream of winning the championship finally came true.
meanings.sent5: The child dreamed of meeting their favorite superhero.

meanings.definition: Imagined as a possibility or a desirable future event.
meanings.sent1: The kids had a dreamed tea party in the backyard.
meanings.sent2: She wore a dreamed dress to the fancy event.
meanings.sent3: The dog looked quite dreamed with its new bowtie.
meanings.sent4: The house was a dreamed vacation spot by the beach.
meanings.sent5: The cake was a dreamed dessert for the celebration.
